summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 262 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 977 m), feels like temperature (up 2.2°C), inside temperature (up 1.6°C), and outside temperature (up 1.8°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 262.2m lower than yesterday, 91.6m lower than the past week, 977.1m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 745m and a high of 3580m, averaging 1724.2m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Some rain can be expected, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and strong and powerful sunlight. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
